Translations.Text: Abange mmwe abakkiriza bwe musisinkananga e kibinja kya balabe munywere, mwogere nnyo ku Katonda, mulyoke muwangule
Era mugondere Katonda n’omubakawe, temukubagananga e mpawa ne kibanafuya, nemuggwamu amaanyi, era mugumiikirize, anti Katonda ali wamu n'abagumiikiriza

Temubeera nga (abakaafiiri) abaafuluma mu mayumba gaabwe nga beekuluntaza n’okweraga eri abantu, era nga baziyiza abantu okuyingira mu ddiini y’a Katonda, nga bulijjo Katonda yeetoolodde ebyo byonna bye bakola

Jjukira Sitane bwe yabalaga bye baali bakola nti birungi, (Sitane) n'abagamba nti tewali muntu yenna waakubawangula olwa leero, era nti mazima nze nja kubataasa, naye ate e bibinja by’ombiriri bwe byasisinkana, Sitane neyeefuula, era naagamba nti, mazima nze siri nammwe, anti mazima nze ndaba bye mutalaba, era mazima nze ntya Katonda, nga bulijjo Katonda muyitirivu wa kubonereza
